children.name: RTP Activation Security
Activation Security
Prevent unauthorized access to activations by different Service Providers
SP_B cannot retrieve activation by Fiscal Code created by SP_A
SP_B cannot retrieve activation by Activation ID created by SP_A
Admin role can read activations across all Service Providers
SP_ACTIVATIONS_READ_ALL can retrieve activation by Fiscal Code created by SP_A
SP_ACTIVATIONS_READ_ALL can retrieve activation by Activation ID created by SP_A
RTP Callback
RTP Callback DS_04b
Service provider sends a callback referred to an RTP
An RTP callback is successfully received
Unauthorized callback due to wrong certificate serial
Failed callback for non existing Service Provider - DS-04b compliant
RTP Callback DS_05
Service provider sends a callback referred to an RTP with status ACTC
An RTP callback with status ACTC is successfully received
RTP Callback DS_08
Service provider sends a callback referred to an RTP
An RTP callback is successfully received with status ACCP
An RTP callback is successfully received with status RJCT
Failed callback for non existing Service Provider - DS-08P compliant
Unauthorized callback due to wrong certificate serial
An RTP callback with status REJECTED is successfully received
Service provider sends a callback referred to an RTP with status ACWC
An RTP callback with status ACWC is successfully received

RTP Cancel

RTP is successfully cancelled

RTP is successfully retrieved
inexistent RTP -> empty body
malformed rtp_id → 400 Bad Request

RTP GPD Message
GPD Message API
Consumer sends RTP message to Sender
A CREATE message is successfully sent through GPD message API
Consumer sends RTP message to Sender with different statuses
A CREATE message with status VALID is successfully sent
A CREATE message with status INVALID is successfully sent
A CREATE message with status PARTIALLY_PAID is successfully sent
A CREATE message with status PAID is successfully sent
A CREATE message with status PUBLISHED is successfully sent
A CREATE message with status EXPIRED is successfully sent
A CREATE message with status DRAFT is successfully sent
An UPDATE message with status VALID is successfully sent after CREATE
An UPDATE message with status INVALID is successfully sent after CREATE
An UPDATE message with status PAID is successfully sent after CREATE
An UPDATE message with status EXPIRED is successfully sent after CREATE
An UPDATE message with status DRAFT is successfully sent after CREATE
Consumer sends DELETE message to Sender after CREATE
A DELETE message after CREATE VALID returns 200
A DELETE message after CREATE INVALID returns 422
A DELETE message after CREATE PAID returns 422
A DELETE message after CREATE PUBLISHED returns 422
A DELETE message after CREATE EXPIRED returns 422
A DELETE message after CREATE DRAFT returns 422
Consumer sends DELETE message to Sender after CREATE and UPDATE
A DELETE message after CREATE VALID + UPDATE VALID returns 200
A DELETE message after CREATE VALID + UPDATE INVALID returns 422
A DELETE message after CREATE VALID + UPDATE PAID returns 422
A DELETE message after CREATE VALID + UPDATE EXPIRED returns 422
A DELETE message after CREATE VALID + UPDATE DRAFT returns 422

An RTP is sent to ICCREA service with activated fiscal code
An RTP is sent to Poste service with activated fiscal code
Service provider sends an RTP
An RTP is sent through API
Debtor fiscal code must be lower case during RTP send
The response body contains a comprehensible error message
Service provider sends an RTP to a non-activated debtor
An RTP is sent through API

Debtor Activation
Activation
Debtor activation
A debtor is activated by an authenticated service provider
A second service provider triggers takeover when debtor is already active on another service provider
A debtor cannot be activated more than once by the same service provider
The activation request must contain lower case fiscal code
Find by payer id request must contain lower case fiscal code
A debtor service provider fails activation due to wrong service provider id
Get Debtor activation by ID
A debtor is activated and retrieved by activation id
Retrieving activation without valid token returns 401
Retrieving non-existent activation returns 404
Retrieving activation with invalid UUID returns 400
List Activations
Get a page of activations
Invalid pagination parameters returns 400
Invalid pagination parameters returns 400
Unauthorized request returns 401
Invalid NextActivationId format returns 400
Non-integer size returns 400
Missing Version header returns 200
Non-existent NextActivationId returns 200 with empty body
